alert.note: Alert for Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 15 at 10:44PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pittsburg County through 1115 PM CST... At 1044 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Stuart to 3 miles northwest of Wardville to 8 miles northeast of Coalgate. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Krebs... Kiowa... Savanna... Alderson... Ashland... Haywood... Mcalester Regional Airport... Blanco... Haileyville... Pittsburg... Arpelar... Dow... Bache... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CST for southeastern Oklahoma.
